title: Order Shot Replica
paragraphs: The Order Shot Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is a reskin of the Splattershot.

The Order Shot has a minimalist appearance, with a white molded piece for the barrel, ink tank, and handle of the weapon, as well as a metallic silver end cap and nozzle. Its appearance is similar to that of a Splattershot.
The Order Shot Replica comes with Suction Bombs and Trizooka. The Order Shot Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Splattershot.
To unlock the Order Shot Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Agent 4's Palette.
For competitive tips about the Order Shot Replica
Note: The strategy advice for Splattershot also applies to Order Shot Replica, because of this, they share the same strategy page.
